about_the_game:
Somewhere in the universe, in a coordinate that no one knows, there is a secret base run by AI. All human civilization infomation are stored there for a backup. There are many spaces call "Astral Battlefield" around the base, Wars happen between the base and the outer threats in an abstract form. Peoples on mother earth will send to the battlefield by "Astral Projection" technology as one force, and all outer threats will project as another force. You need to control your force to win these random situation turn-based strategy war.

Key Features:
  • The Battlefield : A 8x4 grid, all units are put on the battlefield randomly and cover in the beginning.
  • Flip To Gain energe : You need to flip the grid to find out what's in it and you will gain 1 energe.
  • Energe : You need to spend energe for your unit to use skill.
  • The Force : You and your opponent have 16 units in the force.
  • 7 Type Of Units : Each Unit has it's own ability and skill.
